name: My Hot Aunt: A Special World Cup FUTANARI EDITION
name_original: My Hot Aunt: A Special World Cup FUTANARI EDITION
description:
My hot aunt a special world cup, is a game about a guy who for punisment cant go with his parents to the stadium for the world football cup. He's sent to his uncles instead, but his aunt is very hot and his uncle is very busy, will he have fun?

What's different in the Futanari Edition? The Waitress and the Aunt are Futanari!

If you like these games support us on patreon.com/kravenar !
